quotes.content: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that there was within me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.content: To follow, without halt, one aim: There is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.content: Focusing your life solely on making a buck shows a poverty of ambition. It asks too little of yourself. And it will leave you unfulfilled.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.content: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.content: Pick battles big enough to matter, small enough to win.
quotes.author: Alice Walker
